briefdescription.para: Constructor, to be overloaded by subclass.

parameterdescription.para: The parent stman to which this column belongs.
The column's type as defined by Casacore.

briefdescription.para: To be called before destructing the class.

memberdef.argsstring: (DyscoDistribution distribution, Normalization normalization, double studentsTNu, double distributionTruncation)=0
memberdef.name: Prepare

briefdescription.para: Get number of bytes needed for column header of this column.

detaileddescription.para:
This is excluding the generic column header.
Size of column header

briefdescription.para: Get the storage manager for this column.
Read a row of compressed data from the stman file.

parameterdescription.para: The block index of the row to read.
The destination buffer, should be at least of size Stride().
The nr of bytes to be read.

memberdef.argsstring: (size_t blockIndex, const unsigned char *data, size_t size)
memberdef.name: writeCompressedData

briefdescription.para: Write a row of compressed data to the stman file.

parameterdescription.para: The block index of the row to write.
The data buffer containing Stride() bytes.
The nr of bytes to be written.

briefdescription.para: Get the actual number of blocks in the file.
Base class for columns of the DyscoStMan.
